poseDetectValueArray.comment: the angle between 6-8-10 should be close to 90 degree
the angle between 5-7-9 should be close to 180 degree
the angle between 6-5-7 should be close to 100 degree
the y coordinate of point 8 should be over (under) the y coordinate of point 6 because of the value = 0 (1)
the x coordinate of point 8 should be left (right) the x coordinate of point 6 because of the value = 0 (1)
the y coordinate of point 10 should be over (under) the y coordinate of point 8 because of the value = 0 (1)
the x coordinate of point 6 should be left (right) the x coordinate of point 10 because of the value = 0 (1)
the y coordinate of point 5 should be over (under) the x coordinate of point 7 because of the value = 0 (1)
the y coordinate of point 3 should be over (under) the x coordinate of point 4 because of the value = 0 (1)
the angle between vector 3 -> 4 and vector 5 -> 6 should be close to 150 degree
